text: Dyson Clapier (born May 15, 2002), is an American soccer player who plays as a midfielder for Portland Timbers 2 via the Portland Timbers academy. ==Club career== After playing with the Portland Timbers academy, Clapier appeared for Portland's USL Championship side Portland Timbers 2 on August 31, 2019 in a 3-1 win over Reno 1868.https://www.uslchampionship.com/reno1868fc- portlandtimbers2-1037427 ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:American soccer players Category:Portland Timbers 2 players Category:Soccer players from Utah Category:USL Championship players
title: Dyson Clapier
